subject: Thanks, we are accepting your refinance appication
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
 
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
 
$403,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this one-minute form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://milliaiemiilia.com/
